title: Indian banks among select strong banks globally, PM Modi says in Independence Day speech
description: Independence Day Speech: During his Red Fort address, Prime Minister Narendra Modi emphasised that Indian banks have become globally strong due to significant reforms by his government. He discussed the earlier challenges faced by the banking sector and noted that the reforms have now facilitated growth and strengthened the sector's role in the formal economy, benefitting various stakeholders.
